6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Qatadah said:"They told the Prophet (ﷺ) that they had slept and missed the prayer. He said: 'There is no negligence when one sleeps, rather negligence is when one is awake. If any one of you forgets a prayer or sleeps and misses it, let him pray it when he remembers it

chapter.eng-name: Concerning One Who Sleeps And Misses A Prayer
